Text.Page:
Forsil's desperate for barbed diamonds. All my resources are hunting down eldritch shards, or I'd help.

Do you think you could gather some? They're not hard to find and Forsil's known to pay well. They're common south of Bleakrock and north of the Azurice Shrine.

Ah, you brought me diamonds. The snows must be stained red indeed if you got these from under the Junaidars' noses.

Cut properly, these will sell well to arcanists and jewelers. Thank you indeed!
If you don't have the diamonds, I don't have the time.
